content:
I am a visiting student at UC Merced, supervised by Prof. Ming-Hsuan Yang. My research interests include computer vision and deep learning.
After taking several Computer Science and Machine Learning courses at UC Berkeley and NTU, along with my past research experiences as a research assistant at VSLab, NTHU and an intern at an AI startup, RelaJet, I decided to switch field from Finance to Computer Science. I would like to pursue a Ph.D./M.S. degree in Computer Science to consolidate my research career.
Previously, I was lucky to have the opportunities to work with Prof. Min Sun and Prof. Hwann-Tzong Chen at National Tsing Hua University.
Please see my CV (last updated Nov. 2019) for more details.
I am applying for Ph.D./M.S. in Computer Science for 2020 Fall.
